title: Muslim family killed in Canada truck attack - BBC News
content:
1. Muslim family killed in Canada truck attack - BBC News  BBC News
  2. Police say a driver who hit and killed 4 pedestrians in Ontario targeted them because they were Muslim  Insider
  3. A driver slams into a Muslim family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was a hate crime  CNN
  4. 'Sadness and shock': Windsor Muslim community mourns victims of deadly vehicle attack  CTV News Windsor
  5. Muslim family killed in 'premeditated' terror attack in Ontario  TRT World
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
